summary: Adds a vendor to each of the player owned houses in vanilla.
descriptionHtml:
Sexy House Vendors v1.6



===========================================================
-----------------------  IMPORTANT  -----------------------
===========================================================

There is a bug in Skyrim (not in my mod) that will cause a merchant to STOP PAYING GOLD when a player sells items to them.  They will continue to take your items, but you will get no gold in return.  This happens when the vendor accumulates over 30k in gold.  So, the solution is 2fold. . . 

1)  My vendors will now have 28k gold per reset.  
2)  Make sure to do all of your selling before you buy from them and push them over the 30k threshhold.  

I have tested this with vanilla vendors and my vendors and have found it to be true in all of my tests.  


A thank you to SkyDruid on nexus forums.  See his post here:  http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/582784-bug-report-30000-merchant-gold/






===========================================================
Description
===========================================================

Adds a sexy vendor to each of the vanilla houses.  Each vendor lives in your 
houses and buys/sells 24/7.  They have a default sandbox package, so they will 
wander around a little and act like they live there(use your alchemy and enchanting 
stations, furniture etc)  



===========================================================
Merchandise
===========================================================

-Lockpicks  
-Ebony Arrows
-Alchemy ingredients for restore health, damage health, fortify lockpicking. 
-Soul Gems 
-Gold Ore
-A few other things



===========================================================
Conflicts
===========================================================

This should not conflict with any other mods.  The chests, factions, NPCs etc 
etc (everything used) are all uniquely named.  The only possible conflict could 
be if another mod places an item where these vendor chests are.  



===========================================================
To do
===========================================================

-Get their ability to buy stolen goods working.
-Further expand their inventory.



===========================================================
Changelog
===========================================================

v1.6 Workaround for Skyrim bug implemented.  
     Shrank and moved chests out of the way.  
v1.5 Gave them all individual names, hair and outfits.  
v1.1 Tweaking and Fixes.  
v1.0 Initial Release.  



===========================================================
Check out all my mods  
===========================================================
